/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees and bushes that add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the presence of life amidst the tranquility. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the length of the street, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the road. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the essence of the city's blend of nature and urban life.
